desc: Huge sale on our our premium wood fired hot tubs, saunas and geodesic domes! Canada's best quality and best priced 10 x 10 bunkies, A-Frames and Geodesic domes for off-grid living. No permit required and easy to assemble DIY pre fab kits! Our premium wood fired hot tubs with liners come assembled and are off-grid.

layout.text: DON'T MISS OUR SALE FOR HUGE SAVINGS, & BUNDLE 2 OR MORE ITEMS TO SAVE $500 MORE!
